Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Service Delayed at Halsted
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at Halsted due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are standing at Halsted due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
